Author: hikty
Text: i can completely relate. i experience extreme hunger much more when i practice intuitive eating. at this moment i donâ€™t even bother facing fear foods, because i will binge. iâ€™m personally doing semi safe foods and gradually increase calories from there (this is from a restriction standpoint). good luck ðŸ’–

Author: chloesmiddlefinger
Text: I feel this on a spiritual level and I honestly don't know what I want anymore. I wasn't happy when I was underweight, but I'm not happy now that I'm weight restored either. I wasn't happy when I was restricting, but it wasn't half as terrifying as this whole "you can eat whatever you want!" spiel.   Mental hunger is the worst and I want off this ride.
